entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 15 except 26 inland.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 15 except 26 inland. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023
